# Architectural Decision Record (Work)

> **Note:** This extends the base template from `shared/code/templates/docs/adr.md`
> 
> See [shared/code/templates/docs/adr.md](../../../../shared/code/templates/docs/adr.md) for the full template.

## Work-Specific Requirements

For work projects, ADRs must include:
- **Compliance considerations** - How does this align with JPMC policies?
- **Security review** - Any security implications documented and reviewed
- **Approval chain** - Who approved this decision and when
- **Audit trail** - Links to relevant tickets, reviews, sign-offs
- **Rollback plan** - How to revert if needed

## Additional Sections Required

### Compliance
- [ ] Security requirements addressed
- [ ] Data classification verified
- [ ] Change management approval obtained
- [ ] Required reviews completed

### Approvals
| Role | Name | Date | Ticket |
|------|------|------|--------|
| Technical Lead | | | |
| Security | | | |
| Architecture | | | |
